snippet: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg’s comparison of the United Federation of Teachers to the National Rifle Association might have further damaged the already tense negotiations on an evaluation system.
abstract: Mayor Michael R Bloomberg’s comparison of United Federation of Teachers to National Rifle Association is certain to cause further damage to already tense negotiations on a new teacher evaluation system.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg’s comparison of the United Federation of Teachers to the National Rifle Association might have further damaged the already tense negotiations on an evaluation system.

headline.seo: Michael Bloomberg Compares Teachers’ Union to the N.R.A.
headline.main: Teachers Irate as Bloomberg Likens Union to the N.R.A.
headline.print_headline: Teachers Irate As Bloomberg Likens Union To the N.R.A.
